paper_keywords: higher dimensional signal analysis in several complex variables and the Clifford algebra setting
paper_abstract: In this paper, we will give a survey on adaptive Fourier decompositions (AFDs) in one-and multi-dimensions. Theoretical formulations of three different types of AFDs in one-dimension, viz., Core AFD, Cyclic AFD in conjunction with best rational approximation and Unwending AFD are provided.
paper_title: Adaptive Fourier decompositions and rational approximations, part I: Theory
